mapper.select: SELECT r.product_num, r.review_text, r.review_date, r.review_rate, s_writer.user_id as reviewerId, s_writer.store_name AS writerNickname, s_writer.profile_img AS writerProfile FROM review r JOIN store s_writer ON r.store_num = s_writer.store_num JOIN product p ON r.product_num = p.product_num JOIN store s_seller ON p.store_num = s_seller.store_num WHERE s_seller.store_num = #{storeId} ORDER BY r.review_date DESC

SELECT NVL(ROUND(AVG(r.review_rate), 1), 0) as review_rate FROM review r JOIN product p ON r.product_num = p.product_num JOIN store s_seller ON p.store_num = s_seller.store_num WHERE s_seller.store_num = #{storeId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review r JOIN product p ON r.product_num = p.product_num JOIN store s_seller ON p.store_num = s_seller.store_num WHERE s_seller.store_num = #{storeId}
